page.title: 02ETHNIC CONSIDERATIONS CONT.
page.content: {SPECIAL PROVISIONS}FOR THE 5-18 AGE GROUP.AN ATTEMPT TO ESTABLISH AN AFTERNOON CLUB FOR THIS AGE RANGE RECENTLY GAINED LITTLE SUPPORT.THERE IS THE{CARRIBEAN PROGRESSIVE {ASSOCIATION,316 HOE ST.E 17,}WHICH IS JUST OUTSIDE THE AREA,BUT IS A BOROUGH WIDE ORGANIZATION. THE{ASIAN}POPULATION IS LARGELY COMPOSED OF{PUNJABI MUSLIMS}FROM {PAKISTAN}(PART OF THE PUNJAB IS IN INDIA).THEIR{MOTHER TONGUES}ARE {PUNJABI}AND{URDU}.MOST OF THE POPULATION OF THIS AREA IS SIMILARLY COMPOSED. MANY PEOPLE CAME FROM SMALL VILLAGES OR SMALL TOWNS IN THE PUNJAB,WHERE A {PEASANT ECONOMY}IS IN OPERATION AND THRE IS A DEGREE OF CO-OPERATION BETWEEN FAMILIES AND NEIGHBOURS.SOME OF THIS NETWORK HAS TRANSLATED ITSELF TO ENGLAND,BUT THE LEVEL OF SUPPORT
